<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Animated Statue](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2821)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Giant animated statues' increased size and power make them most useful in large vaults, spacious chambers, or outdoor locations. Tasks beyond their capabilities typically require a more advanced construct, not an animated object.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Giant_Animated_Statue.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Giant Animated Statue](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2821)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=563" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=652" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 19 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** -1

**Con** +6

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 (22 when broken)

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +9 

construct armor
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 100

**Hardness**
10
</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=67), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=73), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=623), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=661) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91), [spirit](/Traits.aspx?ID=737), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95), [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509), [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510)

**Construct Armor** Like normal objects, an animated statue has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once an animated statue is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, removing the Hardness and reducing its Armor Class to 22.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stone fist +19 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d12+6 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
flaming coal +12 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 80 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d6+6 bludgeoning and 2d8 fire

**Brazier**   The statue carries a wide brazier full of hot coals. To make flaming coal Strikes or use Burn Alive, the statue must have the brazier held in one hand or otherwise within reach. Instead of targeting the statue with an attack, a creature can target the brazier directly. The brazier has the same AC and saves as the statue. Dealing 15 cold damage to the brazier or dousing it with at least 2 gallons of water extinguishes the coals. This prevents the statue from using Burn Alive and causes its ranged attacks to no longer deal fire damage.

**Burn Alive** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The statue grinds a creature it has [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90) into the red-hot coals of its brazier. The target takes 3d8 fire damage and 1d8 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

</column>
